section.section: If the long-term debt is in the form of bonds, debentures, or other widely held debt, the public service company shall list the name and address of the trustee, if available, in place of the name and address of the creditor.

text.section:
In its annual report, a public service company shall, if available:
list the name and address of each holder of more than 5% of each issue reported under this section; and
identify the holder as a bank, broker, holding company, individual, or other person.
